string-array.name: quotes
string-array.item: ¡Together we build the best place to work!
¡With your actions you create experiences, generate emotions and build team!
“We are not a team because we work together. We are a team because we respect, trust and care for the rest of the team.”\n- Vala Afshar
“If you can laugh together, you can work together.”\n- Robert Orben
